revised_title: Mixed Triammonias: Monatomic and Diatomic Radicals in Poly-Ammonias
tldr: A. W. Hofmann investigates the properties and reactions of mixed triammonias containing monatomic and diatomic radicals. He explores the formation and composition of various nitrogen-based compounds, including diethylene-triamine, triethylene-triamine, and diethylene-diethyldiamine. Hofmann also examines the crystalline structures and solubilities of these compounds in water and alcohol, as well as their reactions with platinum and gold salts.
